gobblin.http

Interface HttpClientConfigurator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultHttpClientConfigurator

    public interface HttpClientConfigurator
    An adapter from Gobblin configuration to HttpClientBuilder. It can also be used to create HttpClient instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HttpClientConfigurator configure(Config httpClientConfig)
      Extracts the HttpClient configuration from a typesafe config.
      HttpClientConfigurator configure(State httpClientConfig)
      Same as configure(Config) but for legacy cases using State.
      org.apache.http.client.HttpClient createClient()
      Typically this will use HttpClientBuilder.build() based on the configuration but implementations may also return decorated instances.
      org.apache.http.impl.client.HttpClientBuilder getBuilder()
      The underlying client builder
      HttpClientConfigurator setStatePropertiesPrefix(String propertiesPrefix)
      Sets a prefix to use when extracting the configuration from State.

    • Method Detail

      • setStatePropertiesPrefix

        HttpClientConfigurator setStatePropertiesPrefix(String propertiesPrefix)
        Sets a prefix to use when extracting the configuration from State. The default is empty.

      • configure

        HttpClientConfigurator configure(Config httpClientConfig)
        Extracts the HttpClient configuration from a typesafe config. Supported configuration options may vary from implementation to implementation.

      • configure

        HttpClientConfigurator configure(State httpClientConfig)
        Same as configure(Config) but for legacy cases using State.

      • getBuilder

        org.apache.http.impl.client.HttpClientBuilder getBuilder()
        The underlying client builder

      • createClient

        org.apache.http.client.HttpClient createClient()
        Typically this will use HttpClientBuilder.build() based on the configuration but implementations may also return decorated instances.
